Tom Emerson wrote:

>Michael Stack writes:
>  
>
>>>I was going to create a project on SourceForge for it, though if you
>>>would rather have it somewhere else, that's fine. 
>>>      
>>>
>>For a while we've been throwing around the notion of an arctools 
>>sourceforge project where we'd put arc tools, scripts, and info 
>>pertaining to ARCs and ARC product (A few suggested tools that might fit 
>>this project are outlined here: 
>>http://crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?AccessTools).   We could go 
>>ahead and set it up now ('arctools' is taken.  'iaarc' or 'iaarctools'?) 
>>    
>>
>
>I'd rather keep the library separate, if only to keep people here
>happy. However, I don't feel strongly, and perhaps for the community's
>sake it should be a subproject. Since my stuff isn't Java-based,
>perhaps it should be separate. I don't know.
>
>  
>
Ok.  Separate project sounds best.   Keep the Basis people happy so 
there's no problems getting us access (Smile). 

We'll just hold off on an IAARCTools project till we have something of 
substance to put up there.

Thanks Tom,
St.Ack.

>    -tree
>
>  
>
